snippet.title: The Adventures of Zomboy Trailer 2024
snippet.description:
Introducing The Adventures of Zomboy, a point and click adventure games created by ArcticArcade. Available to wishlist/buy on Steam.
The game is set in a post apocalyptic world and is about a child zombie where you try to find out more about where he's come from, who he is, where he's going, etc. You get to talk to other characters and help them out to progress.
You might remember the game from the old Flash days, but this has been updated/upgraded for Steam.
